title: Arcade Game Studio v1.32 Windows
description:
Arcade Game Studio Version 1.32

Game studio is a program for making games with the look and feel of the '80s arcade games. Including vertical and horizontal Shooters or Platform games, you will be able to make similar games to Pac-Man, Commando, 1942, Ghosts 'n' Goblins or Gauntlet, all with your own sprite sheets, pixel art, sound effects and music.

Video Tutorial is also included in this torrent to give an idea of what you can do.

Please remember to seed!

Feel free to comment below!
